text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
translation: (1) Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allāh,[1622] and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
footnotes: [1622]- By praising Him and declaring Him far above and beyond any failure or imperfection.
